content: transaction table: CREATE TABLE "transactions" ("transaction_id" serial,"user_id" int not null,"date" date not null default current_date,"transaction_detail" varchar not null,"description" varchar,"transaction_category" varchar not null,"payment_method" varchar,"amount" decimal not null,PRIMARY KEY ("transaction_id"));
users table: CREATE TABLE "users" ("user_id" serial,"first_name" varchar not null,"last_name" varchar,"password" varchar not null,"email" varchar unique,PRIMARY KEY ("user_id"));
conversations table: CREATE TABLE "conversations" ("conversation_id" serial,"user_id" int not null,"role" varchar not null,"content" varchar not null,PRIMARY KEY ("conversation_id"));
transaction_categories table: CREATE TABLE "transaction_categories" ("transaction_category_id" serial,"transaction_category" varchar not null unique,PRIMARY KEY ("transaction_category_id"));
transaction_details table: CREATE TABLE "transaction_details" ("transaction_detail_id" serial,"transaction_detail" varchar not null unique,PRIMARY KEY ("transaction_detail_id"));
payment_methods table: CREATE TABLE "payment_methods" ("payment_method_id" serial,"payment_method" varchar not null unique,PRIMARY KEY ("payment_method_id"));
roles table: CREATE TABLE "roles" ("role_id" serial,"role" varchar not null unique,PRIMARY KEY ("role_id"));
